description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国清代和中华民国初年的一个省份，是今天河北省的前身。
description.en: A province of China during the Qing dynasty and the early Republic of China, the predecessor of modern Hebei province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 解云清的出生地，位于今河北省。
description.en: The birthplace of Xie Yunqing, located in modern-day Hebei Province.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间黑龙江省的权力机构。
description.en: The governing body of Heilongjiang Province during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Heilongjiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 解云清曾担任黑龙江省革命委员会副主任。
description.en: Xie Yunqing once served as the Deputy Director of the Heilongjiang Provincial Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 解云清曾担任黑龙江省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Xie Yunqing once served as the Vice Governor of the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，解云清是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the Wikipedia category, Xie Yunqing was a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 解云清出生于直隶（今河北）清苑。
description.en: Xie Yunqing was born in Qingyuan, Zhili (modern-day Hebei).

description.zh-cn: 文本中提及“直隶（今河北）”，表明河北省是直隶省的后继行政区划。
description.en: The text mentions 'Zhili (modern-day Hebei),' indicating that Hebei Province is the successor administrative division to Zhili Province.
